entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
